summary: Build a simple, professional, mobile-friendly Handyman Recruitment Agency website with candidate registration (including secure document uploads) and client enquiry forms, multiple informational pages, SEO/Google visibility setup, and an admin dashboard for managing submissions. User chose to proceed without email functionality; submissions will be stored in the database/admin dashboard only (no outbound emails or auto-confirmations).
architectural_notes: Email notifications are disabled by choice/constraints; forms will not send emails or auto-confirmations and will store submissions in the database for admin review only.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Square favicon based on the provided logo (favicon.dim_512x512.png)
- Open Graph share image with the logo on a clean black/yellow/navy background (og-image.dim_1200x630.png)

existing_features.title: Create the public site pages and navigation for Handyman Recruitment Agency: Home, Handyman Registration, Hire a Handyman, Services Offered, About Us, Contact, Privacy Policy, and Admin.

Apply a consistent professional visual theme using the brand colors Black, Yellow, and Navy, with a clean 'trade/industrial' look (bold headings, high-contrast buttons, simple icons) and large clear CTAs.
Add the uploaded agency logo (20260211_195621.png) as a static asset and use it in the site header and Home page hero area.

Implement the Home page content: short intro, CTA buttons for “Register as a Handyman” and “Hire a Handyman”, contact number 0712115763 (click-to-call + WhatsApp link), email link to hragency415@gmail.com, Facebook link text “Handyman Recruitment Agency”, operating locations (Uitenhage and Gqeberha), and a simple 3-step “How it works” section.
Add a floating WhatsApp button anchored bottom-right across the public site, linking to WhatsApp chat for 0712115763.

Build the Handyman Registration page with a simple form capturing personal information (Full Name, ID Number, Phone Number, Email Address, Physical Address), work information (Trade/Skill, Years of Experience, Areas willing to work in), and document uploads for CV (PDF), ID Copy, Matric Certificate, Qualification/Trade Certificate; on submit, store the submission and show confirmation text: “Your application has been received. We will contact you if shortlisted.”

Build the Hire a Handyman page with a client enquiry form (Full Name, Company Name (optional), Phone Number, Email, Type of service needed, Location, Message); on submit, store the enquiry and show an on-screen confirmation message (no email).

Build the Contact page including: clickable phone 0712115763, WhatsApp link/button to 0712115763, mailto link to hragency415@gmail.com, Facebook link text “Handyman Recruitment Agency”, operating areas (Uitenhage and Gqeberha), plus simple candidate and client contact forms that store messages in the backend (no email).
Create Services Offered and About Us pages with short, professional copy matching the brief (client services, candidate services; mission, vision, commitment).

Implement secure document upload handling: allow uploading the required candidate documents, store them in the backend associated to the candidate record, and allow authorized admin users to download them via the admin dashboard.

Build an Admin dashboard that lets an authorized admin: view candidate registrations and client/contact submissions; filter candidates by Trade/Skill; view submission details; download candidate documents; update and delete records.

Add admin authentication using Internet Identity and enforce backend authorization checks for all admin-only operations (list all records, download documents, update/delete). Provide a simple allowlist mechanism for admin principals and show the currently signed-in principal in the admin UI for setup.
Implement basic SEO and Google indexing readiness: set page-specific meta titles/descriptions, add a robots.txt and sitemap, and ensure semantic headings and accessible form labels.
Add a Privacy Policy page addressing POPIA-oriented handling of personal data and documents (what is collected, why, retention, access/deletion requests, and contact details).
Ensure the public site is fast and mobile-first: optimize images, avoid heavy assets, and ensure forms and buttons are easy to use on small screens.
Because email sending is disabled, remove/omit all outbound email behaviors and replace them with on-screen confirmation messages and admin dashboard visibility of submissions.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create core website pages (Home, About Us, Services Offered, Contact) with clean black/yellow/navy design, mobile responsiveness, and clear CTAs
Handyman Registration page: online form capturing personal/work info and secure document uploads (CV, ID, Matric, qualifications/trade certificates) with on-screen confirmation message
Hire a Handyman (client contact) page: client enquiry form with on-screen confirmation message
Admin dashboard to view/manage candidate registrations, uploaded documents, and client enquiries; allow filtering by skill; download documents; update/delete records
Database storage for all submissions and uploaded documents with secure handling
SEO & Google visibility: meta titles/descriptions, basic SEO, Google indexing readiness, Google Search Console setup guidance, and Google Business Profile linkage guidance
Site-wide WhatsApp/click-to-call features: floating WhatsApp button linked to 0712115763 plus clickable phone/email/Facebook links
Privacy & compliance: add Privacy Policy page and address POPIA-oriented data handling requirements
HTTPS/SSL and performance: ensure SSL-enabled deployment and fast-loading, mobile-first implementation

Implement backend data storage for candidate registrations (including uploaded documents), client enquiries, and contact messages using the single Motoko actor; include timestamps and stable unique IDs for each record.
